visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include monthly rainfall data with the series name 'Rainfall'. Additionally, the chart should have custom colors and other configurations such as chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and it includes custom background and margin settings for better visual appeal. The x-axis represents months with styled labels and a title, while the y-axis represents rainfall in millimeters with similarly styled labels and a title. The data series includes monthly rainfall data with the series name 'Rainfall' and a custom color of '#008080'. The legend is enabled with custom styling for better readability. Overall, this configuration ensures a visually appealing and informative chart.
